alert.note: Alert for Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 4:30PM CDT until April 20 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN KAUFMAN COUNTY... At 430 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Terrell, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Terrell, Seagoville, Forney, Kaufman, Crandall, Combine, Talty, New Terrell City Lake, Elmo, Oak Grove, Post Oak Bend City, Oak Ridge, Heartland, Rand, Ola, Lawrence and Lake Ray Hubbard. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
